SELECT next_notice_title, next_notice_num FROM ( SELECT notice_num, LEAD(notice_title,1,'다음글이 없습니다.') OVER(ORDER BY notice_num) next_notice_title, LEAD(notice_num,1,0) OVER(ORDER BY notice_num) next_notice_num FROM notice ) WHERE notice_num = #{notice_num}

SELECT prev_notice_title, prev_notice_num FROM ( SELECT notice_num, Lag(notice_title,1,'이전글이 없습니다.') OVER(ORDER BY notice_num) prev_notice_title, Lag(notice_num,1,0) OVER(ORDER BY notice_num) prev_notice_num FROM notice ) WHERE notice_num = #{notice_num}
